name: Paradice Arena
description:
How long will you survive in this chaotic dice combat arena?

Throw dice at the hordes of enemies that  approach you, gaining gold from every killing blow. Then, upgrade the faces of your dice with special abilities - perhaps granting them the ability to explode, freeze, or pierce your foes!

This game was made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam, with the theme 'Roll of the Dice'. 

I hope you enjoy playing it!
